nl.esciencecenter.octopus.security.Credential

  • Packages that use Credential 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.octopus.security
    This package contains classes and interfaces which are required to secure software and hardware resources.

    • Uses of Credential in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.security

      Subclasses of Credential in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CertificateCredential
      A container for security Information based upon certificates.
      class  PasswordCredential
      A security context based upon user name, password combination.
      class  ProxyCredential
      This context is used if you have a credential stored in a myproxy server.
